limit.name: лимит
limit.description: Максимальное количество возвращённых результатов (макс. & по умолчанию: 50).

hide.name: hide
hide.description: Whether or not to hide the command response from other users (default: True).

starts-with.name: начинается-с
starts-with.description: Возвращать только слова, начинающиеся с этого значения (взаимоисключающий с заканчивается-на).

ends-with.name: заканчивается-на
ends-with.description: Возвращать только слова, заканчивающиеся на это значение (взаимоисключающий с начинается-с).

errors.with_clause_exclusivity: Опции `начинается-с` и `заканчивается-на` взаимоисключающие -- их обоих нельзя использовать одновременно.
errors.not_found: К сожалению, я не смог найти никаких результатов по вашему запросу!
errors.not_found_w_suggestions: К сожалению, я не смог найти никаких результатов по вашему запросу! Возможно, вы имели в виду:
errors.no_permissions: У вас нет прав на использование этой команды.
errors.banned:
Боюсь, вас заблокировали от использования Thoth.
Причина: {{- reason}}
errors.limit_outside_range: The `limit` argument must be between 1 and 100.
errors.definition_suggestion_timed_out: You took too long to respond with an alternative word. Command cancelled.

meta.name: прилагательное
meta.description: Ответы с прилагательными, описывающими ваш запрос.

word.name: слово
word.description: Существительное для поиска подходящих для него прилагательных (пример: океан).

meta.name: definition
meta.description: Responds with the definition of your query from Merriam Webster.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search a definition for (eg: ocean).

short.name: short
short.description: Only return the first definition (default: false).

meta.name: homophones
meta.description: Responds with homophones (sound-alike words) for your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search homophones for (eg: their).

meta.name: holonyms
meta.description: Responds with holonyms (what comprises) for your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search homophones for (eg: car).

meta.name: hyponyms
meta.description: Responds with hyponyms (more general) for your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search hyponyms for (eg: car).

meta.name: close-rhyme
meta.description: Responds with words that closely rhyme with your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search close rhymes for (eg: forest).

close-rhyme.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that closely rhyme with `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: triggers
meta.description: Responds with words that are statistically associated with your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search triggers for (eg: cow).

triggers.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that closely rhyme with `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: invite
meta.description: Returns an invite link to add Thoth to your server.

invite.success: Want to add Thoth to your server? [Click here]({{- link}})!

meta.name: match-word
meta.description: Responds with words that match the word you provide (eg: a??le -> apple, d??? -> date).

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to find matches for (example: a??le).

meta.name: noun
meta.description: Responds with nouns that are often described by your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: TThe adjective to search relevant nouns for (eg: yellow).

meta.name: ping
meta.description: Ensures the bot is responding to commands.

pongs: What can I do ya' for?
What's with you puny humans and the constant desire to bother me?
Out of everyone here, you chose to bother me?
So *this* is the meaning of life?
Can we just get this over with?? I have stuff to do.
Do it again. I dare you.

meta.name: rhyme
meta.description: Responds with words that rhyme with your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search rhymes for (eg: dime).

rhyme.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that rhyme with `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: wotd
meta.description: Configure the Word of the Day channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to set as the Word of the Day channel.

errors.guild_text_only: The Word of The Day channel must be a text channel!
errors.no_perms: I don't have permissions to create a webhook in {{- channel}}.

wotd.success: The Word of The Day will be posted in {{- channel}} every day at <t:1667538001:t> (12am GMT-5).
wotd.no_channel: You must provide a channel to set as the Word of the Day channel.

meta.name: similar-meaning
meta.description: Response with words that have a similar meaning to your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search similar words for (eg: transgressions).

similar-meaning.generic_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}`{{rest}}: 

{{words}}
similar-meaning.starts_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}` and start with `{{starts_with}}`: 

{{words}}
similar-meaning.ends_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that are similar to `{{word}}` and end with `{{ends_with}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: similar-spelling
meta.description: Responds with words that have a similar spelling to your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search similar words for (eg: agile).

similar-spelling.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that're similarly spelled to `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: sounds-like
meta.description: Responds with words that sound like your query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search similarly sounding words for (eg: agile).

sounds-like.success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that sound like `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: that-follow
meta.description: Responds with words that could logically follow query.

word.name: слово
word.description: The word to search following words for (eg: open).

that-follow.generic_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that logically follow `{{word}}`: 

{{words}}
that-follow.starts_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that logically follow `{{word}}` that start with `{{starts_with}}`: 

{{words}}
that-follow.ends_with_success:
I found `{{found_count}}` words that logically follow `{{word}}` that end with `{{ends_with}}`: 

{{words}}

meta.name: word-of-the-day
meta.description: Responds with the word of the day from Merriam Webster.
